an6.46:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā mahācundo cetīsu viharati sayaṃjātiyaṃ.
an6.46:1.3: Tatra kho āyasmā mahācundo bhikkhū āmantesi:
an6.46:1.5: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahācundassa paccassosuṃ.
an6.46:2.2: ‘ime pana jhāyinomhā, jhāyinomhāti jhāyanti pajjhāyanti nijjhāyanti avajjhāyanti.
an6.46:2.3: Kimime jhāyanti, kintime jhāyanti, kathaṃ ime jhāyantī’ti?
an6.46:2.4: Tattha dhammayogā ca bhikkhū nappasīdanti, jhāyī ca bhikkhū nappasīdanti, na ca bahujanahitāya paṭipannā honti bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. (1)
an6.46:3.1: Idha panāvuso, jhāyī bhikkhū dhammayoge bhikkhū apasādenti:
an6.46:3.2: ‘ime pana dhammayogamhā, dhammayogamhāti uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā muṭṭhassatī asampajānā asamāhitā vibbhantacittā pākatindriyā.
an6.46:3.3: Kimime dhammayogā, kintime dhammayogā, kathaṃ ime dhammayogā’ti?
an6.46:3.4: Tattha jhāyī ca bhikkhū nappasīdanti, dhammayogā ca bhikkhū nappasīdanti, na ca bahujanahitāya paṭipannā honti bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. (2)
an6.46:4.1: Idha panāvuso, dhammayogā bhikkhū dhammayogānaññeva bhikkhūnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, no jhāyīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
an6.46:4.2: Tattha dhammayogā ca bhikkhū nappasīdanti, jhāyī ca bhikkhū nappasīdanti, na ca bahujanahitāya paṭipannā honti bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. (3)
an6.46:5.1: Idha panāvuso, jhāyī bhikkhū jhāyīnaññeva bhikkhūnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti, no dhammayogānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.
an6.46:5.2: Tattha jhāyī ca bhikkhū nappasīdanti, dhammayogā ca bhikkhū nappasīdanti, na ca bahujanahitāya paṭipannā honti bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ. (4)
an6.46:6.5: Acchariyā hete, āvuso, puggalā dullabhā lokasmiṃ, ye amataṃ dhātuṃ kāyena phusitvā viharanti. (5)
an6.46:7.5: Acchariyā hete, āvuso, puggalā dullabhā lokasmiṃ ye gambhīraṃ atthapadaṃ paññāya ativijjha passantī”ti. (6)
